title: Sample Painting 1
description: This is a sample painting entry. Replace this with your actual painting information.

description: A second sample entry showing how to add multiple paintings.
details: This demonstrates how multiple painting entries are formatted. Each painting is separated by a comma. Remember not to put a comma after the last entry in the array.

details: When adding your own paintings, simply copy one of these sample entries and modify all the fields with your painting's information. Make sure to increment the id number for each new painting.
